title: Chotta chotta ninaika lyrics engeyum eppodhum lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Chinmayi  Sathya
Song: Chotta Chotta
Movie: Engeyum Eppodhum
Music: Sathya

Chotta chotta nanaiya vaithaai
sollaamal kodhikka vaithaai
ettaadha idathilen nenjai parakka vaithaai

Kitta thatta karaiya vaithaai
kittaamal alaiya vaithaai
Thittaamal thittith thaan
Un kaadhal unara vaithaai

Rayil varum, paalamaai
Aiyo endhan idhayam
Thada thada thadavena thudikka

Nee oru naal oru naal vidhaiyaai
Vandhu vizhundhaai kannukkulle
Vizhi paarkkum podhe maramaai
Indru ezhunthaai nenjukkulle
Ada ini enna nadakkum
Manam nadandhadhai nadikkum

Oru kutti poonai pola
Kaadhal etti paarkkuthe
Adhu acham madam naanam ellaam
Thatti paarkkudhe paarkkudhe
Paarkkudhe korkkudhe

Andha kadavul adadaa aangal
nenjai mezhugil seithaanadi
Adhu ovvoru nodiyum pennai
Kandaal urugida vaithaanadi
Intha mounathin mayakkam
Romba pidikkuthu enakkum
Un pechum moochum ennaith
thaakki vittuch chendrathe
Nee vittuch chendra nyaabagangal
Patrik kondathe kondathe
Kondathe vendrathe

Chotta chotta......
